name: NSItemProvider.PreferredPresentationStyle
desc: The presentation styles that determine how a view should show an item provider's data.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: A presentation style indicating that no preferred style is specified.

items.name: case inline
items.desc: A presentation style indicating that the item provider data should be presented inline.

items.name: case attachment
items.desc: A presentation style indicating that the item provider data should be presented as an attachment.
